root.name: Moonbase Alpha
root.description: OverviewNASA has returned to the Moon and established a self-sufficient outpost, the titular Moonbase Alpha. You play the role of an astronaut working at the outpost. Your mission is to repair the moonbase after it is struck by a meteorite. You can play with up to 6 people and there are several maps to accommodate different numbers of players. The game is scored on the time it takes your team to complete the objectives. There are multiple ways to complete objectives and online leaderboards. System RequirementsMinimum OS: Win XP SP3 Processor: 2.0 GHZ Single Core Processor Memory: 2 GB of System RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 7000-series or ATI Radeon X1900 Video Card DirectX®: DirectX 9.0c Hard Drive: 2 GB of Free Hard Drive Space Sound: DirectX 9.0c compliant audio Recommended OS: Win XP SP3 / Vista / Windows 7 Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core Processor Memory: 4 GB of System RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 9000 or ATI Radeon 3600 Video Card DirectX®: DirectX 9.0c Hard Drive: 5 GB of Free Hard Drive Space
